MO Altria should buy Swedish Match if they are really serious about oral nicotine products Ive been using swedish snus or nicotine pouches for half my life and have no plans to stop I reccon probably about 13 adults in Sweden are using snus on a daily basis and its a far better alternative to any smoke product probably including vapingSwedish Match are exploading in US with one of their latest products Zyn which is a nicotine pouch but without tobacco Swedish Match has an enterprise value of 84 billion Swedish Krona or about 9 billion USD Low debt PE 2020 earnings at about 165xAt the moment there are no major holders of stock in SM since everyone wants to be focused on enviroment and being green nowadays making a decent entry for MO into the stock in my eyes With the excellent distribution that MO has it can probably get SMs products out on a larger scale I am long MO and BTIShow More

The Beverly Hills City Council has unanimously approved a ban on the retail sale of most tobacco products with a sweeping ordinance that is believed to be the first of its kind in the nation The ban which is set to begin in 2021 prohibits the sale of cigarettes cigars pipe tobacco chewing tobacco and electronic cigarettes sold in gas stations convenience stores pharmacies and grocery stores Only exemption Tobacco sales will be permitted at highend cigar lounges and hotels MO BTI PM JUUL
